titles.title: Providing for a revised edition of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives for the One Hundred Sixth Congress.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 594, H. Res. 607 is considered passed House.

bill.summary: 10/20/1998--Introduced. Provides for the printing of a revised edition of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives for the 106th Congress as a House document.
